name: The Artifact (itch) (Zodiark92)
description:
In this game you have to protect the Artifact for the required time.

The Artifact bleeds and  will be attacked from the wolfs.  Harvest the fruits from the bushes and get close to the Artifact to heal it.

SEE THE HOW TO PLAY INFO.

To Play the game:

  • Press SPACE to harvest the fruits from the bushes
  • Get close to the Artifact to feed it
  • Click the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON  to attack the Wolfs
  • There are wolfs that will attack and destroy the bushes
